channel.title: National News,More on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in National News,More on NewsStreet

item.title: Maharashtra CM Shinde group MLAs 'in touch', claims former CM Thackeray camp
item.description: Maharashtra CM Shinde group MLAs ‘in touch’, claims former CM Thackeray camp UBT Deputy Leader Sushma Andhare claimed that some ‘rebel’ MLAs belonging to CM Eknath Shinde’s Balasahebanchi Shiv Sena are “in contact” with her party

item.title: Bihar bypolls: 52.38 per cent turnout at close of polling
item.description: Bihar bypolls: 52.38 per cent turnout at close of polling According to poll officials, the turnout in Mokama was 53.

item.title: Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) expresses sympathy with Pilot, says 'next Amarinder Singh of Congress' will be from Rajasthan
item.description: Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) expresses sympathy with Pilot, says ‘next Amarinder Singh of Congress’ will be from Rajasthan Election in-charge Mishra said, “I have been saying that a Congress government in Rajasthan exists only in name, all other work is being done jointly by BJP-Congress.

item.title: West Bengal shows how VCs become victims of faulty application of the law
item.description: West Bengal shows how VCs become victims of faulty application of the law The iconic University of Calcutta recently turned out to be a perfect example of how the Vice Chancellor of a state-run university can become a victim of an ego tussle between a state government and the governor

item.title: Misuse of technologies by terrorists undermine global peace, security, says UN Under-Secretary-General Vladimir
item.description: Misuse of technologies by terrorists undermine global peace, security, says UN Under-Secretary-General Vladimir Vladimir stressed that misuse and abuse of technologies by terrorist groups to advance their agendas undermine international peace and security

item.title: Bhakti' in politics is road to dictatorship: Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge
item.description: Bhakti' in politics is road to dictatorship: Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge on Friday drew a distinction in “Bhakti” in religion and politics and how it was dangerous in the latter.

item.title: Check facts before sharing on social media, says PM Narendra Modi
item.description: Check facts before sharing on social media, says PM Narendra Modi Emphasising on the need to create awareness against fake news, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday said that social media cannot be underestimated and that a small piece of fake news generated by it can create chaos.

item.title: PM Narendra Modi lauds Paytm, commends reach of digital payments in far-off places
item.description: PM Narendra Modi lauds Paytm, commends reach of digital payments in far-off places Prime Minister Narendra Modi had hailed financial services and digital payments leader, Paytm during his recent speech at the Mana village in Uttarakhand.

item.title: 'Operation Lotus' exposed, Rs 100 cr to make MLAs defect, alleges Congress
item.description: ‘Operation Lotus’ exposed, Rs 100 cr to make MLAs defect, alleges Congress Union Minister for Tourism and Culture G.

item.title: Punjab government to sensitise people on gender-based violence on October 27
item.description: Punjab government to sensitise people on gender-based violence on October 27 The Punjab government would organise a state-level awareness function in Jalandhar on October 27 to further sensitise people on gender-based violence
